title: Emerald and Diamond Push Back Earrings - Pachala Kempu Bugada
materials: Ruby. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and antique look.
features: Classic Bugada earrings with a flower-like design, featuring oval cabochon cut emeralds and a central ruby, surrounded by sparkling white CZ diamonds. Scalloped edge detailing adds a touch of elegance. The settings showcase intricate craftsmanship typical of South Indian jewelry.
occasions: or any special occasion. Adds a touch of traditional glamour to modern ethnic wear as well.
description: Exquisite example of Bugada earrings. The vivid emeralds and sparkling diamonds create a captivating contrast against the rich gold. The classic flower design holds cultural significance and makes it a timeless heirloom piece, adding grace and sophistication to the wearer. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and antique charm.
